attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:
We respectfully request that the USCIS not increase the fees for finger-printing
and for the I-600A form. It is a financial hardship for families who are endeavoring
to adopt an orphan. The fee increase will adversely affect so many families
because, due to the regulation that the I-171H expires after 18 months, many
families will have to re-file (and hence re-pay for) their I-600A, so please do not
increase these fees; it's difficult enough that we will have to repay to refile, please
don't make it worse by raising these fees. Thank you very much.
Resptectfully,
George Piazzi
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by George Piazzi
